Reporting directly to the VP of Talent, this position is responsible for defining and executing the talent acquisition strategy for the University of Phoenix.  Manage, develop, and mentor a team of 15 industry-experienced Managers, Recruiters and Coordinators in full life-cycle recruitment for all staff and faculty positions within the University.

Reporting directly to the CHRO, responsible for defining and executing the talent acquisition strategy for Apollo Education Group and all of its subsidiaries.  Manage, develop, and mentor a team of 15 industry-experienced Managers, Recruiters and Coordinators in full lifecycle recruitment.
recommendations: Dustin Faultner, SPHR (L.I.O.N.)
People Person. Problem Solver. HR Leader
July 26, 2012, Dustin reported directly to Evan

I had the privileged of working with Evan Elbert since I was hired at the Apollo Group in 2012. Evan is an amazing recruiter, a thorough professional and a great manager. Having worked his way up the finance and recruiting ranks, he understands the job and can easily relate to the challenges faced in a TA team. He attacks problems with integrity and professionalism as they arise. His support to his employees is unwavering, earning him a well deserved reputation of admiration and respect. I would work with/for Evan in any organization.

Vanessa Silva
Manager, Global Talent Acquisition @ EA
February 5, 2014, Vanessa worked with Evan in the same group

It is my pleasure to highly recommend Vanessa as an innovative leader for talent acquisition.  One of the best attributes of Vanessa is that she has sat in the seat of a Sr. Recruiter so is able to create and drive strategies that not only work for the business but make sense for the recruitment team.  She's masterful at juggling multiple priorities and has the ability to elevate the talent acquisition function in the eyes of senior management.  She has strength in building relationships with her team, her business partners, and her leaders.  Vanessa would be a great asset to any organization.

summary: Driven talent acquisition leader with nearly 20 years of experience building, leading and working within strategic top-performing teams.  Extensive experience in building scalable talent plans, recruiting teams (both on-site and off-site), and processes to ensure an integrated strategy for attracting, retaining & developing key talent.  Serve as top Talent Acquisition leader for $3B+ publicly-traded business who was recently sold to one of the largest private equity firms and taken private.
